22#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
23#include <config.h>
24#endif
25
26#include <math.h>
27#include <errno.h>
28
29#ifdef HAVE_STRUCT_EXCEPTION
30#ifdef TLOSS
31
32int matherr(exc)
33struct exception *exc;
34{
35 switch (exc->type) {
36 case SING:
37 case DOMAIN:
38 errno = EDOM;
39 break;
40 case OVERFLOW:
41 case UNDERFLOW:
42 case TLOSS:
43 case PLOSS:
44 errno = ERANGE;
45 break;
46 }
47 return 1;
48}
49
50#endif /* TLOSS */
51#endif /* HAVE_STRUCT_EXCEPTION */
52
